sentences.sContent: people of the same gender
Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.

sentences.sContent: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.sCn: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.sContent: traditional gender roles
toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes

sentences.sContent: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.sCn: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

sentences.sContent: ...They were the pioneers of gender equity...
...and its efforts to conquer the gender gap impart a vital lesson-though not the lesson the Swedes had in mind...
...Let us hope these do not include banning gender pronouns...
...Sweden has done more than other nations to close the gender gap...
...implementing more gender quotas...
...where gender equality is vigorously pursued and enforced...
...Americans should look past the gender rhetoric and consider what these Scandinavians have achieved...
...and non-sexist child rearing would close the gender divide once and for all...
...Look at any global survey of gender equality and Sweden will be near the top...
...the World Economic Forum found that when it comes to closing the gender gap in economic participation and opportunity...
...It's very simple: the more we structure children and adolescents' environment around gender distinctions and separation...
...gender segregation narrows our perceptions of each other...
...But any discussion of gender differences in children inevitably leads to this debate...
...teachers resorted to traditional gender stereotypes to run their classes...
...researchers are increasingly discovering benefits of gender interaction in youth...
...and ultimately concluded that single-sex education is not the answer to gender gaps in achievement — or the best way forward for today's young people...
...and so the widely-held view that gender separation is somehow better for boys...
...I met several developmental and cognitive psychologists whose work was addressing gender and education from different angles...
...Reinforcement occurs when we receive direct or indirect rewards or punishments for particular gender role behaviors...
...these theories don't explain why gender roles can change in adulthood or later life...
...they learn about gender by watching who does what in their families...
...Regarding gender role building...
...Children also learn gender roles through indirect reinforcement...
...where gender discrimination is against the law...
